expertise: âœ… **Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning** â€“ Extensive experience in building and deploying machine learning models using supervised, unsupervised, and deep learning techniques. Proficient in feature engineering, hyperparameter tuning, and model optimization. âœ… **Natural Language Processing (NLP)** â€“ Expertise in text pre-processing, tokenization, sentiment analysis, and named entity recognition (NER). âœ… **Computer Vision & Image Processing** â€“ Strong background in applying OpenCV, TensorFlow, and PyTorch for real-time image recognition, segmentation, and object detection. âœ… **Predictive Analytics & Statistical Modeling** â€“ Proficient in time-series forecasting, regression analysis, and anomaly detection using statistical and probabilistic methods. Experience in leveraging Bayesian inference, Markov models, and ARIMA models for predictive insights.

âœ… **Big Data & Analytics** â€“ Hands-on experience with **Apache Spark and Hadoop** for large-scale data processing. Proficient in **SQL, NoSQL databases**, and ETL pipelines for data wrangling and transformation. Skilled in real-time streaming analytics using Kafka.

âœ… **Software Development & Engineering** â€“ Strong programming skills in **Python, R, Java, SQL, JavaScript, and Ruby**. Experienced in software version control (Git, GitHub) and CI/CD pipelines. âœ… **Cloud & Database Technologies** â€“ Knowledgeable in **AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS)** and **Google Cloud Platform** for scalable ML model deployment. Experienced in managing **MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB** databases for structured and unstructured data management.

âœ… **Data Visualization & Business Intelligence** â€“ Proficient in **Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly Dash** to create insightful and interactive dashboards. Experienced in delivering actionable insights through data storytelling.

âœ… **DevOps & Model Deployment** â€“ Experience with deploying machine learning models in production using **MLOps** best practices. Implemented scalable AI pipelines using Docker, Kubernetes, and TensorFlow Serving. Strong knowledge of API integration and edge deployment strategies.
